mapper.select:
select sfp.id,sfm.name as facilities_name,su1.actual_name as examiner_name,su1.tel as examiner_tel, sfp.status,sfp.plan_begin_date,sfp.space_time,sfp.check_rate_type,su2.actual_name as create_name from sys_facilities_plan as sfp,sys_facilities_manage as sfm,sys_user as su1,sys_user as su2
sfp.examiner = su1.id and sfp.create_id = su2.id and sfp.facilities_manage_id = sfm.id
and sfm.name like concat('%',#{facilitiesName},'%')
and su1.tel like concat('%',#{tel},'%')
and sfp.is_delete = 1
order by sfp.create_date desc
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_facilities_plan( facilities_manage_id, examiner, status, plan_begin_date, space_time, check_rate_type, create_id, create_date, is_delete )values ( #{facilitiesManageId}, #{examiner}, #{status}, #{planBeginDate}, #{spaceTime}, #{checkRateType}, #{createId}, #{createDate}, #{isDelete} )
select LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into sys_facilities_execute( status, facilities_plan_id, begin_date, end_date, sort )values ( #{status}, #{facilitiesPlanId}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{sort} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from sys_facilities_execute where facilities_plan_id = #{facilitiesPlanId}
